channel.title: How to find coordinates of objects PI
channel.description:
Hello i've been wondering how to remove objects. I know how to remove them if i know the coordinates. I remember when i used to code delta's that i used to have a client that let me right click on object and show me coordinates of the object.
Does anyone know how to add this to PI's?

item.title: How to find coordinates of objects PI
item.dc:creator: @imthebeastlol imthebeastlol
item.description:
@imthebeastlol wrote:

some things are in the mapdata like lets say a table i think you would have to remove it from there. idk know how though

Read full topic
item.source: How to find coordinates of objects PI
